Parish Council
The Parish Council is an elected group of lay members who assist with the administrative duties of the parish. They are also assigned leadership and oversight positions of various ministry projects under the guidance of the Priest for the further equipping and growth of the Church.
Parish Council - 2023
Parish Priest –
Rev. Fr John Mamangakis
President –
Kevin Cruz
Vice President –
Jim Crist
Vice President –
Gregory Demko
Treasurer –
Bob Azari
Ass’t. Treasurer –
S
haron Colonis
Secretary –
Crystal Monocandilos
Ann Athans
Illona Christie
Nicholas Gieseler
Nick Kapsis
Service Times
Orthos
– Sunday 9:00 am
Divine Liturgy
– Sunday 10:00 am
Sunday School
–  Sunday 11:00 am
Bible Study
– following the Divine Liturgy

Contact Us
The Church office is open from 9:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. Monday through Friday.
Administration
Phone:
772-464-7194
Fax: 772-464-5595
The office is open from 9:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. Monday through Friday. For appointments with the Fr Andrew Maginas, please call the number above.
